Malgbe bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia a na-asụ na ugwu Cameroon na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Chad
Olumba bụ Douguia, Dro, Malgbe, Mara, na Walia
A na-asụ Malgbe na obodo Goulfey yana ndịda na Chari (ngalaba Logone-et-Chari, mpaghara Far North)
Ọ metụtara Afade, Mser, Lagwan, Maslam, na Mpade
A na-eme atụmatụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ ruru puku iri atọ na isii.
